definition: atomic weight of an element/atomic mass
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The isotope of uranium with mass number235, fissionable with slow neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 錒鈾鈾的同位素，原子質量數爲235，與慢。

sentences.english: 12 That gives it a mass number of 312.
